I love working with flowers and making people happy with them.
I like to express my style through my fashion.
Others will be impressed by my video editing skills.

content.text: I'm good! I'm retired, so I have a lot of free time on my hands. I usually spend it running, watching movies, or working in the garden.
That's great! I'm a florist, so I get to work with flowers all day. I love it!
That sounds really fun! I always love getting flowers. I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
That's a tough balance. I know how that is.
I'm thinking about taking up video editing as a hobby. I think it would be fun to learn how to do that.
That would be really cool! I know a lot about video editing, so I could help you learn.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go shopping and express my style through my fashion.
That's cool! I'm not much of a shopper myself, but I do like to wear nice clothes.
Me too! I love finding new clothes that make me feel good.
What do you like about your job?
I love making people happy with my flowers. It's so rewarding to see someone's face light up when they see the flowers I've picked out for them.
That's so sweet! I'm sure you're really good at your job.
